comment: розовый ужас сделанный из Риззы, бегает по каюте капитана

languages.text: "То огромное расписное корыто в углу комнаты — это чтобы топить врагов, да? Неплохо, но Р'Изза предпочитает выкидывать их в шлюз: так они смешнее барахтаются!"

traits.locale_text: "То огромное расписное корыто в углу комнаты — это чтобы топить врагов, да? Неплохо, но Р'Изза предпочитает выкидывать их в шлюз: так они смешнее барахтаются!"

languages.text: "That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"
languages.original_text: "То огромное расписное корыто в углу комнаты — это чтобы топить врагов, да? Неплохо, но Р'Изза предпочитает выкидывать их в шлюз: так они смешнее барахтаются!"

traits.locale_text: "That huge painted trough in the corner of the room, it is for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: they're much funnier when they flap around!"
"That huge painted trough in the corner of the room, it is for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: they're much funnier when they flap around!"
"That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"
"That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"
"That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"

languages.text: “房间角落里那个巨大的油漆罐，应该是用来淹死敌人的吧？还不错，不过雷扎更喜欢把他们从气闸里扔出去，看他们扑腾的样子更有趣！”
languages.original_text: "That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"

traits.locale_text: “房间角落里那个巨大的油漆罐，应该是用来淹死敌人的吧？还不错，不过雷扎更喜欢把他们从气闸里扔出去，看他们扑腾的样子更有趣！”

languages.text: « L'immense bassin peint dans le coin de la pièce, il vous sert à noyer vos ennemis ? Pas mal, comme idée, mais R'Yzza préfère les balancer par le sas : c'est plus amusant de les voir gigoter dans le vide ! »
languages.original_text: "That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"

traits.locale_text: « L'immense bassin peint dans le coin de la pièce, il vous sert à noyer vos ennemis ? Pas mal, comme idée, mais R'Yzza préfère les balancer par le sas : c'est plus amusant de les voir gigoter dans le vide ! »

languages.text: 「あの部屋の隅にあるペイントされた巨大タンクって、敵を溺れさせるためのものでしょ？悪くないけど、ルイッツァはエアロックから放り出す方が好き。バタバタするのを見てるほうがずっと面白いもの！」
languages.original_text: "That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの部屋の隅にあるペイントされた巨大タンクって、敵を溺れさせるためのものでしょ？悪くないけど、ルイッツァはエアロックから放り出す方が好き。バタバタするのを見てるほうがずっと面白いもの！」

languages.text: «Ese enorme tanque pintado en la esquina de la sala es para ahogar a vuestros enemigos, ¿no? No está mal, pero R'Yzza prefiere lanzarlos por la esclusa. ¡Es más divertido verlos intentar aletear!».
languages.original_text: "That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"

traits.locale_text: «Ese enorme tanque pintado en la esquina de la sala es para ahogar a vuestros enemigos, ¿no? No está mal, pero R'Yzza prefiere lanzarlos por la esclusa. ¡Es más divertido verlos intentar aletear!».

languages.text: "Dieser riesige bemalte Tank in der Ecke, der ist dazu da, Feinde zu ertränken, ja? Nicht übel, aber Ryzza wirft sie lieber aus einer Luftschleuse. Es macht viel mehr Spaß, sie so herumzappeln zu sehen!"
languages.original_text: "That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"

traits.locale_text: "Dieser riesige bemalte Tank in der Ecke, der ist dazu da, Feinde zu ertränken, ja? Nicht übel, aber Ryzza wirft sie lieber aus einer Luftschleuse. Es macht viel mehr Spaß, sie so herumzappeln zu sehen!"

languages.text: "Odanın köşesindeki şu boyalı tank, düşmanları boğmak için... Değil mi? Fena değil ama R'Yzza, onları hava kilidinden atmayı tercih eder. Dönüp durmalarını izlemek daha eğlenceli!"
languages.original_text: "That huge painted tank in the corner of the room, it's for drowning enemies, yes? Not bad, but R'Yzza prefers throwing them out of an airlock: it's much funnier to watch them flap around!"
